body: @sondinhcap https://nhentai.net/g/173155/ sorry, I kinda randomly pop back through my favorites and only just saw your comment. She didn't really ntr hm, but she let him think she did, cus shes nuts like that :P

@Erihan its hard to tell. Faceless-kun is faceless, so all we really get is his hairstyle, and since this is a prequel or rather "the first encounter" its difficult to tell. There is also that it elludes this is just what her ideal relationship is in her head, the last part when she kicks the guy looks a lot like faceless-kun and that is her encounter with him, whereas everything else is just what she "picked up" from her magazine. (which if it is just what she learned/imagines, and the fact it actually follows all the previous volumes, makes me worried now that she will just discard him. He really doesn't deserve it, especially after her "NTR" chapter)
